alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist, western Bradford, northwestern Alachua, southwestern Union, southern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Worthington Spring to near Trenton. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bell, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Alachua, High Springs, Fort White, Worthington Springs, Groves, Providence and Upland Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
